Instance.description: The situation that is used to control the behavior of the Host NPC at a restaurant venue.

TunableTuple.name: _arriving_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used for when a Sim is arriving as a staff member.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _host_station_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used for when a Host is idling at the host station.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableVariant.name: _object_to_staff_filter
TunableVariant.description: Either a list of object definitions or tags that identify the type of object the Sim in this situation will be staffing.

TunableTuple.name: object_definitions
TunableTuple.description: A Tunable Filter that filters based on specific object definitions.

TunableList.name: items_to_check
TunableList.description: A List of the definitions that can be matched to fulfill the filter. This list is considered a Match Any requirement.

Tunable.description: A reference to a definiton that can be matched as part of the filter.

TunableTuple.name: object_tags
TunableTuple.description: A Tunable Filter that filters based on a tag set.

TunableList.name: tag_set
TunableList.description: A Set of tags that can be matched to fulfill the filter. The set is considered a Match Any requirement.

TunableEnum.description: A reference to a tag that can be matched as part of the filter.

TunableTuple.name: _right_this_way_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used to get the Host to run the "Right this way" social before routing to the table with the guests.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

Tunable.name: max_attempts_to_run_social
Tunable.description: The number of times that a host can fail to run the Right This Way social before giving up and just showing the Sims to their table.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _show_to_table_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used for when a Host is showing a group to their table.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when it exits the interaction pipeline causes this particular state to change back to the arrival state.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: guest_take_seat_interaction
Tunable.description: The interaction to push on each of the guests in the group that targets their chosen seat.

Tunable.name: host_head_start_in_sim_minutes
Tunable.display: Host Head Start In Sim Minutes
Tunable.description: The number of sim minutes that the guests will wait after the host begins to show them to their table before they start to follow.

Tunable.name: host_show_to_table_interaction
Tunable.description: The interaction to push on the host that will "show" the guests to their table.

Tunable.name: requesting_sim_show_to_table_interaction
Tunable.display: Requesting Sim Show To Table Interaction
Tunable.description: The interaction to push on the sim requesting a table that will get the guest close to their table so a social can be pushed on them to show them the table.

Tunable.name: right_this_way_interaction
Tunable.description: The interaction that the Host runs before both the Host and the guests start routing to the table.

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: The job that a staff member will be in during the situation.

TunableTuple.name: total_work_time
TunableTuple.description: The amount of time in sim minutes an employee will work before leaving for the day.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: total_work_time_buffs
TunableList.description: A mapping from percentage duration worked to buffs applied to employees working more than this amount. Buffs don't stack; the higher percentage buff is the applied one.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The percentage duration worked.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: The buff applied to employees working over the specified amount.

TunableVariant.name: buff_reason
TunableVariant.description: If set, specify a reason why the buff was added.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The reason the buff was added. This will be displayed in the buff tooltip.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: Buff that will get added to sim.
